Subject: Major Incident Resolved: Oracle Services not accessible in HO1
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

Dear Colleague, 

 

Chalhoub Tech has resolved the access issue affecting Oracle services at the HO1 location.

 

Service was impacted due to an issue on Wifi at HO1.

 

Issue Reported: Oracle Services not accessible in HO1

Start Date and Time: 24 Mar 2025 , 11.03 AM GST

End Date and Time: 24 Mar 2025 , 12:00 NOON GST

 

Status: Resolved

 

If you require any assistance during this timeframe, we kindly request you to raise a support ticket by visiting OneReach.
